title: This remote is head and shoulders about the regular Apple TV remote — and it’s only $26.97
content:
Macworld

We’re all still feeling our way through the dawn of the streaming age, watching all our favorite movies and TV shows right on our computers or mirrored to a living room TV. But there remain a few old time TV creature comforts that even streaming can’t quite make us forget. Like the power of having a trusty remote at your side for full control of viewing at the click of a button.

You can make right that streaming era wrong with a Function101 Button Remote for Apple TV, now just $26.97.

Designed and fully tested to work with all Apple TV and Apple TV 4K models, this nifty remote offers full control and navigation when you’re piloting through your viewing options. Using infrared technology, you can sync to your TV, then control power, volume and all the other functions you need.

From up to nearly 40 feet, this connection makes a viewing experience even easier with your Apple TV, leagues ahead of the regular Apple Siri remote. Just establish a line of sight and your remote should be easily compatible with most TVs, including high-end 4K screens.

“This more traditional TV remote works much better and fixes many of the bad design traits of the original Apple TV remote,” fan Will Slade reported in his five-star review.

Pick up the Function101 Button Remote for Apple TV now for just $26.97 while this offer lasts.
